about_the_game:
The beginning of the game story ...

Jo Yeon-seul, a female student living an ordinary life. Her daily life was ordinary, but her abilities were somewhat extraordinary.
That is the ability to control [lucid dreaming].
Yeon-seul was living with extraordinary joy in ordinary daily life by making full use of her [lucid dreaming] ability.
In the lucid dream of Yeon-seul, a female student who was living like that, someone approached her.
“Can you manage my world...?”
A voice was heard from a certain sphere, but Yeon-seul was left blankly looking at the sphere due to the sudden situation.
Then a hand came out of the sphere, grabbed Yeonseul's wrist, and led her somewhere.
Yeon-seul arrived in another world in a lucid dream.
There were no modern structures, and the scenery looked reminiscent of the old days of East Asia.
And, there were not many people, and fantasy beings from folk tales, myths, and folk tales that were passed down in this area were living together.
Yeonsul saw this scene and asked the sphere.
“I manage this world?”
"Yes"
“For what reason do you do that?”
“I am the Goddess of Creation. So there are countless worlds I created. This place is one of them, a place I named [Hyeonmongdowon].
There is no reason why I can't take charge, but it's because I want to give other children a new experience.
Even if you get harmed here, you won't actually get hurt, so don't worry. What do you think, do you want to do it?“
“Yes, I will try!”
Yeonseul, who was quite interested in a place called Hyeonmongdowon, willingly agreed, and suddenly found herself at [Johee Shrine], which she would use when living in Hyeonmongdowon.
She changed into a shrine maiden outfit, and she seemed to like that look as well.
“Well then, that’s all I’ll tell you. We will meet again soon! Let’s face each other in real life, not as a sphere.”
The body that left those words, the sphere, has disappeared somewhere.

How to play the game (In the Demo version, only up to 3 chapters of normal mode are available, and all other content is restricted.)

1. Normal mode (game start menu)
Whenever you enter each chapter, avoid and attack multiple enemy attacks that will appear for a certain amount of time and shoot down!
After a certain amount of time, the boss comes out and dialogue to the player and starts a duel with the player.
Beat the boss and enter the next chapter or look at the endings!

2. Boss rush mode (BR Start !! menu)
Normal mode is difficult to continue (within a limited number of times) regardless of the number of times to unlock the mode. (clear once)
In this mode, there are no enemy and no dialogue to the boss.
And it's a little harder than normal mode boss!
Only if you duel with the boss and the fast battles and Beat the boss, you will go to the next chapter or the game ends immediately!
(There is no ending in this mode.)

3. Another Story
This is content that allows you to learn more about things other than the prologue and the conversation with the boss.
This unlocks varies depending on the play mode and final clear point.

4. Bonus Image
This is a menu where you can view additional images of each boss through the unlocked items that appear each time you defeat the boss.
You must exceed a certain number to unlock it, and the unlock value varies depending on the boss.

5. Achieve
Through over 20 achievements, we have diversified the way you enjoy the game a little!

Game configuration keys
(If there is no separate guide key, the key will be used.)

Back : X, Esc

Menu/Weapon Select : Z, Enter

Menu/Character Move : Arrow Key(For a character, press Shift to move slowly.)

Fire Weapon, Proceed Dialogue to Boss : Z

Use Bomb, Skip Dialogue to Boss : X

Pause Menu : Esc
